Dice (10,000) Score Keeper

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 canvas.

Description: A simple application that will keep score for the classic game of Dice (10,000). I cold never seem to find a pen and paper when I needed one so I created this app primarily for my Android phone.

Android APK: Download Dice.APK
